pageContext.patina: Slight dark brown patina rubbed off in places.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,No. 1,J.W. Clark Esq. Bridwell, near Uffenline, Devon,Now Somerset County Museum, Taunton Castle
pageContext.site: England, somerset,wellington,said to have been found near the wellington monument (on the black down hills)
pageContext.remarks: This celt was for many years on the mantle piece in the kitchen of a house in Holcombe Rogus, Devon, + was sold about 1909 to the person from whom it was purchased by Mr. Clarke. The original purchaser then said it was said to have been found near the Wellington Monument.
